HTMLElementToggle_event.summary: The toggle event of the interface fires on a {{domxref("Popover_API", "popover", "", "nocode")}} element (i.e. one that has a valid popover attribute) just after it is shown or hidden.

blockquote.para: Note: The toggle event behaves differently when fired on details elements. In this case, it does not relate to popovers, and instead fires when the open/closed state of a <details> element is toggled. See the HTMLDetailsElement page for more information.
